scripts.build: npm run build:contract && npm run build:web
scripts.deploy: npm run build:contract && near dev-deploy --wasmFile build/contract.wasm
scripts.start: npm run deploy && echo The app is starting! && env-cmd -f ./neardev/dev-account.env parcel frontend/index.html --open
scripts.dev: npm run deploy && nodemon --watch contract -e ts --exec "npm run start"
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: npm run build:contract && cd contract && npm run test
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:ts && npm run test:integration:rs
